trans-unit.source: An **ISESnippet** object is an instance of the Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISESnippet class.
trans-unit.target: An **ISESnippet** object is an instance of the Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISESnippet class.

trans-unit.source: The members of the **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.Snippets** collection are all examples of **ISESnippet** objects.
trans-unit.target: The members of the **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.Snippets** collection are all examples of **ISESnippet** objects.

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to create a snippet is to use the [New-IseSnippet[PSITPro5_ISE]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0a6339a3-2683-4a8e-8929-90ad9a95c3e0) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: The easiest way to create a snippet is to use the [New-IseSnippet[PSITPro5_ISE]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0a6339a3-2683-4a8e-8929-90ad9a95c3e0) cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.

trans-unit.source: The read-only property that gets the name of the author of the snippet.
trans-unit.target: The read-only property that gets the name of the author of the snippet.

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.

trans-unit.source: The read-only property that gets the code fragment to be inserted into the editor.
trans-unit.target: The read-only property that gets the code fragment to be inserted into the editor.

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 and later, and not present in earlier versions.

trans-unit.source: The read-only property that gets the Windows keyboard shortcut for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: The read-only property that gets the Windows keyboard shortcut for the menu item.
